# Vendored LightGBM artifacts (Windows)

This directory contains prebuilt LightGBM artifacts redistributed with this repository for Windows.

## Contents

- `lightgbm.exe`: LightGBM CLI
- `lib_lightgbm.dll`: LightGBM shared library
- `*.lib` / `*.exp`: Windows import libraries / export definitions
- `*.pdb`: debug symbols

## Platform

Intended platform: Windows (x86_64).

## Provenance

- Upstream project: LightGBM (https://github.com/microsoft/LightGBM)

These files are unmodified upstream binaries unless otherwise noted.
